ptxt.intxrefpoff: EGR Valve Removal and Installation:For Petrol Engine Model

s1.ptxt: Check resistance between following terminals of EGR valve (1) in each pair.
If found faulty, replace EGR valve assembly.

spec.title: EGR valve resistance (A – B, C – B, F – E, D – E terminal)

s1.ptxt: Remove carbon from EGR valve gas passage.

attention2.ptxt: Do not use any sharp-edged tool to remove carbon.
Be careful not to damage or bend EGR valve (1), valve seat (3) and rod.

s1.ptxt: Inspect valve (2), valve seat and rod for fault, cracks, bend or other damage.
If found faulty, replace EGR valve assembly.
